summary: This is a revamped version of my oldest mods; re-balanced and re-crafted from the bottom up.
descriptionHtml:
This follower is based upon a character of mine in one of my various personal projects, and I thought that the mod came out well enough to be able to share it. 

Unfortunately, I was not able to figure out how to carry over my in game character to the Creation Kit exactly (I tried the whole importing thing, with the correct mods\' .esp active in the kit), but no matter what it didn\'t turn out right. Oh well, this is as close as it is going to get, I suppose. 

Sheva\'s backstory is... well, that\'s kind of secret, but she is a missionary, therefore passive aggressive. The clothes she wears aren\'t enchanted or anything, so basically she will wear whatever you want her to because everything else in the game is either the same level or higher. Though, her weapons and accessories are quite up there, which goes along well with her lore (WHICH IS A SECRET!)

There are absolutely no required mods for this to work, as I couldn\'t figure out how to implement them in game. They showed up correctly in the Creation Kit, and then when I tested the mod out, everything defaulted to vanilla. BS.

Found in the Dead Man\'s Drink in Falkreath.

Mods in the picture: 
CBBE Curvy
a little sexy apparel replacer
CoverKhajiits - Female
Pretty Female Idles 15 (without optional file)

Credits to me!
author: Kasaru
